name: Tuggowar
description:
We fused the best features from Card games and Real-Time Strategy to create a game-changing deck-builder.

In this strategy game, you build a new deck of cards from scratch for each match. The set of cards you choose from is randomized, so every match is unique! To win the tug of war, you have to improvise at every turn.

Soon you will discover amazing new combos and other.. oh wait, no, let me just buy another Tank!

Gameplay Game modes Community
